channel.title: parallel on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in parallel on Fresh Swift

item.title: Parallel Programming with Swift: What could possibly go wrong?
item.description: In this post Jan Olbrich describes what can go wrong when programming for concurrency in Swift.

item.title: Parallel programming with Swift: Promises
item.description: In this article from Jan Olbrich, we learn about Promises, and how we can use the PromiseKit library to implement asynchronous operations.
